problem.headline: Having a website isn't enough — it needs to bring customers
problem.description: Many businesses have websites that nobody finds or that drive customers away. Without a clear strategy, the investment doesn't pay off.
problem.pain1: Slow website that makes people leave
problem.pain2: Visitors don't know how to contact you
problem.pain3: Nobody finds the website on Google

howItWorks.headline: From first contact to live website in 4 steps
howItWorks.description: Simple and transparent process. No surprises, no complications.
howItWorks.step1Desc: We talk about your business, what you need, and your goals. No commitment.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We present a proposal with price and timeline. We create the design and website copy.
howItWorks.step3Desc: We build the website, optimized for mobile and ready to appear on Google.
howItWorks.step4Desc: We put the website live and provide basic training. Support included for questions and adjustments.

differentials.headline: What makes us different
differentials.description: We don't make cheap, forgotten websites. We make websites that work and bring customers.
differentials.diff1Desc: Your website loads in under 3 seconds on mobile. Nobody leaves because it's slow.
differentials.diff2Desc: Optimization included from the start (SEO). It's not an extra — it's part of every project.
differentials.diff3Desc: We write text designed to convince and generate action. Not just to fill space.
differentials.diff4Desc: No surprises or hidden costs. You know exactly what you'll pay from the start.
differentials.diff5Desc: We don't disappear after delivery. Ongoing support for questions and changes.

faq.headline: Questions? We Answer
faq.description: Simple answers to the most common questions.
faq.q1: How long does it take to have the website ready?
faq.a1: A sales page is ready in 5 to 7 business days. A complete website takes 10 to 15 business days, depending on size. We agree on the exact timeline at the start.
faq.q2: What is SEO? Will the website appear on Google?
faq.a2: SEO means optimizing the website to appear in Google results when someone searches. Yes, all our websites are prepared to appear on Google from the start.
faq.q3: Do I need to have a domain and hosting?
faq.a3: If you already have them, we use yours. If not, we help you register. We recommend options starting at €50 per year that include everything.
faq.q4: Does the website work well on mobile?
faq.a4: Yes, absolutely. All websites we create work perfectly on mobile, tablet, and computer. It's one of our priorities.
faq.q5: Can I make changes to the website later?
faq.a5: Yes. We deliver the website with a simple panel for basic changes. For bigger changes, you can count on our support.
faq.q6: What's the difference between a website and a sales page (landing page)?
faq.a6: A website has multiple pages (home, services, contact, etc.). A sales page is a single page focused on one goal: getting the person to contact or buy. Ideal for ad campaigns.
faq.q7: What do I need to send to get started?
faq.a7: Information about your business, logo (if you have one), and photos. If you don't have text ready, we write it. We explain everything in the first chat.
faq.q8: Is there support after the website is delivered?
faq.a8: Yes. All packages include support for questions. The Premium package includes 3 months of priority support with adjustments included.
faq.a9: Sales pages start at €200. Complete websites from €400. The final price depends on size and features. We always provide a free, no-obligation quote.
faq.a10: Usually 50% to start and 50% on delivery. For larger projects, we can split into more payments. We accept bank transfer and MBWay.
